question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. Diwan-i-Mustakhraj - Introduced by Alauddin Khilji
  2. Diwan-e-Amir-Kohi - Introduced by Muhammad Bin Tughlaq
  3. Diwan-i-Bandagani - Introduced by Firoz Tughluq
   Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Diwan-i-Bandagan was Department of Slaves introduced by Firoz Shah Tughlaq. Diwan-i-Amir-Kohi was Department of agriculture introduced by Muhammad bin Tughluq.  Diwan-i-Mustakhraj was Department of arrears introduced by Alauddin Khilji.
